data.title: 4 ways to travel via train, car, taxi, and plane
data.meta_description: The cheapest way to get from Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3 costs only €39, and the quickest way takes just 6½ hours. Find the travel option that best suits you.

Questions & Answers

The cheapest way to get from Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3 is to drive and train which costs €20 - €110 and takes 20h 31m.

More details

The fastest way to get from Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3 is to drive and fly which takes 6h 27m and costs €70 - €170.

More details

The distance between Ainselu Kharka and VRP2+8R3 is 777 km. The road distance is 404.4 km.

Get driving directions

It takes approximately 20h 31m to get from Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3, including transfers.

More details

Yes, the driving distance between Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3 is 404 km. It takes approximately 7h 1m to drive from Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3.

Get driving directions

There are 44+ hotels available in VRP2+8R3. Prices start at €14 per night.

More details

What companies run services between Ainselu Kharka, Bagmati Province, Nepal and VRP2+8R3, Chalsa- Panjahora Rd, Top, Chalsa, West Bengal 735206, India?

There is no direct connection from Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3. However, you can drive to Jaynagar, take the train to Katihar Jn, take the train to New Mal Jn, then take the taxi to VRP2+8R3. Alternatively, you can drive from Ainselu Kharka to VRP2+8R3 in around 7h 1m.
